texts.name: Nirbas
texts.biography: The tale of Nirbas is a strange one. He appeared through a celestial portal one day not speaking a word to anyone. He has since won many battles for the Glacial Kingdoms but he has yet to utter a single word.

specialty.name: Celestials
specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Celestials by 1 and their Attack and defense skills by 5% for every 3 levels (rounded up).
